title: A brief examination of some passages in the chronological part of a letter, written to Dr. Sherlock in his vindication in a letter to a friend.
author: Milner, John, 1628-1702.
publisher: Printed and sold by Randal Taylor ...,
notes: Attributed to Milner by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints; occasionally attributed to Samuel Grascome.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
